name: Beamed In
description: Hello! This is a game for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. It took me a while although there is probably a lot of bugs, I didn't have time to test and am not a very good playtester! I am also not very good at coding so I didn't make it too complicated but hope you enjoy! (All of the tutorial stuff is displayed at the button of your screen through text in the rocks.)
